lessonGuidance: The displayed pattern is known as the 1-1 pattern.
This occurs whenever there are two adjacent 1’s with a safe tile in one of the corners of the 1’s.
The first 1 guarantees a mine in one of the two hidden tiles adjacent to it.
The second 1 touches both of these same tiles, meaning its 1 mine is accounted for so all remaining adjacent tiles are safe.

instructions: Using the information about the pattern you just learned, CLEAR each tile that you know 100% is a mine going from top left to bottom right of the board.
